00042 class Imc
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     Imc();
00046     ~Imc();
00047 
00048     void Initialize(void);
00049 
00051     void LoadOptions(const string &file);
00052     
00054     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom);
00055     
00057     void EndEvaluate();
00058     
00059     void WriteEvery(int write_every) { _write_every = write_every; }
00060     void DoBlocks(bool do_blocks) { _do_blocks = do_blocks; }
00061     void DoImc(bool do_imc) { _do_imc = do_imc; }
00062     
00063 protected:
00064     Average<double> _avg_vol;
00065     
00066     typedef ub::matrix<double> group_matrix;
00067     typedef ub::matrix_range< group_matrix > pair_matrix;
00068     
00070     struct interaction_t {
00071         int _index;
00072         Property *_p;
00073         HistogramNew _average;
00074         double _min, _max, _step;
00075         double _norm;
00076         bool _is_bonded;
00077     };
00078     
00079     // a pair of interactions which are correlated
00080     struct pair_t {
00081         interaction_t *_i1;
00082         interaction_t *_i2;
00083         int _offset_i, _offset_j;
00084         pair_matrix _corr;
00085         pair_t(interaction_t *i1, interaction_t *i2,
00086                 int offset_i, int offset_j, const pair_matrix &corr);                
00087     };
00088     
00090     struct group_t {
00091         list<interaction_t*> _interactions;
00092         group_matrix _corr;
00093         vector<pair_t> _pairs;
00094     };
00095     
00096     
00098     Property _options;
00099     // we want to write out every so many frames
00100     int _write_every;
00101     // we want do do block averaging -> clear averagings every write out
00102     bool _do_blocks;
00103     // calculate the inverse monte carlos parameters (cross correlations)
00104     bool _do_imc;
00105 
00106     // number of frames we processed
00107     int _nframes;
00108     int _nblock;
00109 
00111     list<Property *> _bonded;
00113     list<Property *> _nonbonded;        
00114     
00116     map<string, interaction_t *> _interactions;
00118     map<string, group_t *> _groups;
00119                     
00121     interaction_t *AddInteraction(Property *p);
00122         
00124     group_t *getGroup(const string &name);
00125     
00127     void InitializeGroups();    
00128 
00129     
00130     void WriteDist(const string &suffix="");
00131     void WriteIMCData(const string &suffix="");
00132     void WriteIMCBlock(const string &suffix);
00133 
00134     void CalcDeltaS(interaction_t *interaction, 
00135                     ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > &dS);
00136     
00137     void ClearAverages();
00138 
00139     class Worker : public CsgApplication::Worker
00140     {
00141     public:
00142 
00143         vector<HistogramNew> _current_hists;
00144         Imc *_imc;
00145         double _cur_vol;
00146 
00148         void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom);
00150         void DoNonbonded(Topology *top);
00152         void DoBonded(Topology *top);
00153     };
00155     void DoCorrelations(Imc::Worker *worker);
00156 
00157     bool _processed_some_frames;
00158     
00159 public:
00160     CsgApplication::Worker *ForkWorker();
00161     void MergeWorker(CsgApplication::Worker *worker);
00162  };
00163  
00164  inline Imc::pair_t::pair_t(Imc::interaction_t *i1, Imc::interaction_t *i2,
00165          int offset_i, int offset_j, const pair_matrix &corr)
00166          :
00167   _i1(i1), _i2(i2), _offset_i(offset_i), _offset_j(offset_j), _corr(corr)  {}
